short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the new tab page with a simple page that displays the current time and weather.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize Chrome's new tab page with the "New Tab" extension. It displays the current time and weather to better plan your day, and with the personalized shortcuts feature, you can quickly access your favorite sites. You can add tasks to your task list to be more productive, and you have a search box to quickly find what you're looking for. With this extension, experience a unique personalized browsing experience that adapts to your specific needs.
